name: Airpods Max
description: AirPods Max combine high-fidelity audio with industry-leading Active Noise Cancellation to deliver an unparalleled listening experience.

name: macbook air
description: Apple M2 is a series of ARM-based system on a chip designed by Apple Inc. as a central processing unit and graphics processing unit for its Mac desktops and notebooks, the iPad Pro and iPad Air tablets, and the Vision Pro mixed reality headset.

name: iphone 15 max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max have a few special new hardware features that you should know about to make the most of your new phone, including five amazing cameras, a new action button and charging at USB 3.0 speeds.

name: airpods 2G
description: AirPods deliver an incredible wireless headphone experience. Simply take them out and they arre ready to use with all your devices. technology lets you connect it with compatible devices wirelessly High-quality AAC audio offers immersive listening experience Built-in microphone allows you to take calls while working

name: Homepod mini
description: HomePod is a powerhouse of a speaker. Apple engineered audio technology and advanced software deliver high fidelity sound throughout the room.

name: ipad
description: IPads include a central processing unit, memory, display, and back and front cameras. They run iPadOS, Apple's iOS version for the iPad
